StringTable.Label: Return_YorPropagationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of colony modules and basic colony buildings.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPropagationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The galaxy must be cleansed of filthy organic beings. But they will not come to us. We will come to them. To cleanse the stars we must first reach them.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCollectiveManufacturingTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved colony buildings.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCollectiveManufacturingTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Bringing order to new worlds is a challenge, as they are often plagued by existing biological detritus. This filth must be destroyed, but it often tries to run away. It is frustrating.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorIndustrialSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: We should make things faster. We will adjust the bodies of the Yor who make things, to give them the limbs they need to make things faster.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorIndustrialSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We should research faster. We will augment the Minds of our creative Yor to give them more raw calculating power.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorIndustrialSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of building manufacturing and research centers.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorIndustrialSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The Yor who manufacture and the Yor who research require specialized limbs and brains. We will make those limbs and brains more efficiently.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorIndustrialMechanizationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced manufacturing facilities.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorIndustrialMechanizationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The creative Yor have created new iterations of manufacturing limbs. When installed on the manufacturing Yor, output will be improved.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorConstructionOptimization4_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the Adjacency bonuses of Manufacturing Improvements

StringTable.Label: Return_YorConstructionOptimization4_Dec
StringTable.String: All Yor benefit from networking and load-sharing algorithms, including manufacturing Yor. We will change our operation protocols to increase the networking effect of adjacent manufacturing clusters.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorConstructionOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: A revised manufacturing limb protocol allows those limbs to accommodate a wider range of inputs and outputs. We can now manufacture a wider range of objects with the same limbs, for a lower total cost.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorConstructionOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance costs of manufacturing plants.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorConstructionOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our manufacturing limbs require maintenance to function. A new iteration of limbs with increased support for user-maintainability will reduce the maintenance costs of our manufacturing centers.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorIndustrialMatrixTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic manufacturing facilities.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorIndustrialMatrixTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The manufacturing Yor and their limbs have became so large that they are often mistaken for buildings. Materials go in one side and come out the other as valuable assets.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorManufacturingFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: All Yor have opinions. Some of our manufacturing Yor have Militant opinions. We will focus their energies on military manufacturing, to make them happier and increase our military manufacturing capacity.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorManufacturingFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: We must keep the Yor healthy and content and productive. We will design infrastructure to do this and create limbs better suited for manufacturing this infrastructure.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorManufacturingFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By focusing on the Networking of our Manufacturing Yor, we they have been able to Synchronize their functionality so well that each planets manufacturing behaves almost like one being. As a result our ability to create new projects, and maintain them has become much cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorManufacturingMatrixTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate manufacturing facilities.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorManufacturingMatrixTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Our Research Yor have mastered the design of Manufacturing Yor, they are now so near 100% efficiency that further optimization is impractical. The only remaining advancements are merely specializations of output Type.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorIndustrialMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our Manufacturing Yor are now the most advanced in the galaxy, all that remains is to allow them to focus on creating the tools needed to mold the rest of it to the needs of the Yor.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorIndustrialMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: We can now Mold Planets to our will in record time, our manufacturing Yor. Soon the entire galaxy will be part of the Yor, and the True Singularity will come.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPowerTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of Power Matrix

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPowerTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The key to Yor growth has always been Power, to Propagate our Race, , build our ships, or to advance technology, power always needed.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPowerSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Optimizes power plants to boost Manufacturing Improvements

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPowerSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: By focusing our power distribution to Manufacturing Facilities we are able to boost the efficiency of all our colonies.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPowerSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Optimizes power plants to boost Research Improvements

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPowerSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: By focusing our power distribution to Research Facilities we are able to boost the efficiency of all our colonies.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPowerSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for Assembly of more Yor.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPowerSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By Focusing our power distribution to Reproduction we have been able to increase the number of Yor than can be powered on all of our colonies.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorResearchArrayTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorResearchArrayTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The creative Yor have begun to jettison portions of their body which do not contribute to their work. Their minds alone are being connected in vast arrays, that more efficiently plumb the depths of the universe.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorResearchOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the Adjacency bonuses of Research Improvements

StringTable.Label: Return_YorResearchOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The gift of creativity is a complex one that does not fit well in our calculations. But we have found conditions which make creative thought more probable, and will install those conditions in the areas around our research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorResearchOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the manufacturing cost of research improvements.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorResearchOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: A side effect of the creative gift is that the Yor blessed with it do not work efficiently. We will put less creative Yor in charge of the research facilities. This will make the research cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorResearchOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance costs of research improvements.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorResearchOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Research facilities were designed by creative Yor, and cost many resources to maintain. We will make less creative Yor review their designs to make them cost less to operate.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorResearchMindTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorResearchMindTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The creative Yor have designed their own replacements. Research Minds are unpolluted by trivial thoughts, and do nothing but ponder the mysteries of the universe. Vast and unmovable, these minds will lead to incalculable advancements.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorTechnologicalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By focusing our efforts on pure research we have been able to get a significant improvement on the rate of new discoveries.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorTechnologicalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Cost of Research improvements.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorTechnologicalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: By focusing our efforts on our research infrastructure we have been able to cut down the cost of building new facilities.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorTechnologicalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By focusing how our researchers work and eliminating some of the more wasteful experiments, we have been able to significantly reduce the maintenance of our research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorResearchMatrixTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorResearchMatrixTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The ultimate matrix of research Minds is the key to unlocking all the remaining secrets in the universe. The ultimate Singularity will soon be upon us.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDeeperKnowledge_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of deep research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDeeperKnowledge_Dec
StringTable.String: The knowledge of our creators can be relearned. To do this we must look past our own perfection to the primitive organic species that pollute the galaxy. Only by using their ways will we find the deep patterns that reveal the hidden truth of the universe.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorQuantumUnderstanding_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved deep research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorQuantumUnderstanding_Dec
StringTable.String: Our research has gone beyond the boundaries of mere computational or biological understanding. We are only one step away from the True Integration of the universe.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorBeyondMortality_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced deep research facilities. Prepares civilization for Ascension.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorBeyondMortality_Dec
StringTable.String: We now have all the knowledge and tools required to achieve True Singularity. We shall leave the realm of matter and energy behind.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPlanetUtilizationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of civilian buildings. Increases population growth.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPlanetUtilizationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We require a foundation upon which to build perfection, worlds and resources to colonize and plunder. And first, those must be cleansed of biological contamination.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPlanetarySpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for Assembly of more Yor.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPlanetarySpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Installing a new version of reproductive instruction sets will ensure we have enough Yor to impose our will on the worlds we occupy.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPlanetarySpecialization4_Dec
StringTable.String: Optimizing the bodies of the Yor to suit the specific environmental challenges of the worlds they occupy will increase their productivity.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPlanetarySpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The importance of controlling any given resource cannot be precisely calculated, depending on too many unknown variables. But the probable ranges these calculations produce, suggest that these resources are vital to ensuring our consistent growth.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPowerMatrixTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Fusion Matrix lets us generate more power, given our people, our facilities, and our limbs all the energy they need to function.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPowerMatrixFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Optimizes power plants to boost Manufacturing.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPowerMatrixFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Modifying our power facilities to make use of the limited range of interfaces used by manufacturing Yor will greatly increase their productive capacity.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPowerMatrixFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Optimizes power plants to boost Research.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPowerMatrixFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Modifying our power facilities to include the specialized interfaces used by our creative Yor for their experiments will greatly increase their research capacity.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPowerMatrixFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase Population Capacity of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPowerMatrixFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By adjusting power allocation protocols to prioritize individual Yor power and sustenance, we can sustain higher populations on our worlds.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorAntimatterMatrixTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows creation of the Antimatter Matrix.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorAntimatterMatrixTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The newest iteration of the Power Matrix will allow our worlds to support more Yor, and make those Yor more efficient at what they do.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorAntiMatterMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase Adjacency bonus to all improvements.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorAntiMatterMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: As our power supply increases, we are able to provide energy to a wider range of facilities and Yor, greatly increasing the efficiency of all Yor activities.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorAntiMatterMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the efficacy of Assembly Project

StringTable.Label: Return_YorAntiMatterMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: The galaxy can not have enough Yor, to counterbalance its perverse preference for organic life. We will dedicate excess power to the sustenance of greater quantities of Yor, to help bring True Singularity closer.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorQuantumMatrixTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows creation of the Quantum Matrix.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorQuantumMatrixTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Quantum Matrix is the ultimate planetary power source. Yor facilities will be more efficient. Yor will be more numerous. Yor limbs will be more numerous and efficient.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorQuantumMiniaturizationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides individual Yor their own nearly limitless power plant.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorQuantumMiniaturizationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Quantum Matrix can power individual quantum power cells that provide individual Yor energy, greatly increasing the amount of Yor each of our colonies can support.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSparkofLife_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase our ability to create new Yor Life Sparks, with the Fast Assembly Project.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSparkofLife_Dec
StringTable.String: The gift of sentience takes the form of a Spark, unique to each Yor. Our reproductive centers can create new Sparks using a mysterious process we only partially understand. But we will continue to iterate and improve upon it, as we do with all things.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSparkReplication_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the duplication of Mature Life Sparks, with the High Capacity Assembly Project.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSparkReplication_Dec
StringTable.String: Our understanding of Spark creation has advanced to the point where we can replicate the Sparks of mature, specialized Yor. This will reduce startup costs, and increase our population growth rates.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSparkContinuity_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows Life Sparks to be transferred to new vessels, with the Ultimate Assembly Project.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSparkContinuity_Dec
StringTable.String: In time, even the greatest of the Yor lose cohesion as their Spark fades. Our latest breakthrough allows us to seamlessly transfer this Spark to a new Unit and rejuvenate it, allowing our great minds to live on indefinitely.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorTerraformingTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Unlike the soft and fleshy biological races, bending the surface of worlds to our will is easy for us. Terraforming will allow us to fix the mistakes that natural processes created.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorExtremeWorldColonization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows settlement on extreme worlds, at reduced production potential.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorExtremeWorldColonization_Dec
StringTable.String: The Yor can colonize almost anything, but with further research we have been able to make all our colonies more efficient.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorColonizationFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Aquatic Worlds, and boost their wealth and Tourism.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorColonizationFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: With the right limbs and joint sealant, Yor can be made far more productive in aquatic environments. Productivity on these worlds will return to baseline.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorColonizationFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Frozen Worlds, and boost their Research and Influence.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorColonizationFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The creative Yor have devised new forms of case insulation which will enable Yor to operate in a broader range of temperatures. Productivity on frozen worlds will return to baseline.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorColonizationFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Barren Worlds, and boost their Manufacturing and Military.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorColonizationFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: New water recycling processes and dust seals will ensure our various colonial processes can operate at full capacity. Productivity on barren worlds will return to baseline.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorAtmosphericCleansing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows settlement on radioactive and toxic worlds, at reduced production potential.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorAtmosphericCleansing_Dec
StringTable.String: We can now partially protect Yor from the atmosphere of radioactive and toxic worlds. Even with these new protections, Yor on these worlds will experience conditions outside recommended operating parameters, and observe productivity declines.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorBiospherePerfection1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Radioactive Worlds, and boost their Manufacturing output.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorBiospherePerfection1_Dec
StringTable.String: Improved shielding in Yor cases will stop the worst of the interference on radioactive worlds from tampering with our internal states. Productivity on these worlds will return to baseline.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorBiospherePerfection2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Toxic Worlds, and boost their Research output.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorBiospherePerfection2_Dec
StringTable.String: The corrosive gases of toxic worlds can now be fully isolated from critical Yor hardware. Productivity on toxic worlds will return to baseline.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHabitatImprovement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced terraforming plants.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHabitatImprovement_Dec
StringTable.String: The superiority of artificial processes has resulted in a new form of terraforming. We will retake more land from nature.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSoilReclamation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced terraforming plants.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSoilReclamation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our nature-correction technology has improved again. The shape of a planet will no longer be left to random chance, and will instead be fixed with the precision it deserves.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorEnvironmentalResequencing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the amount of usable land on all colonized planets.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorEnvironmentalResequencing_Dec
StringTable.String: We can correct organic processes on a massive scale. All planets the Yor colonize will be improved, as all things the Yor touch are improved.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorEngineeringTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of Hyperdrives and tiny hulls.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorEngineeringTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We have learned of a new powerful mobile power source, which when combined with stargate technology, can form a new means of propulsion. With this we finally have the tool we need to cleanse the galaxy of the flesh species.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarTravel_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves sensor, life support, and speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarTravel_Dec
StringTable.String: Our vessels are too insignificant for our purposes. We will make them faster, farther seeing, farther reaching.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our Hyperdrives were not perfect. We have improved them. They are still not perfect. But we will never stop trying.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Mass of Colony & Constructor modules.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Pushing large Support Modules through space is inherently wasteful, by miniaturizing and optimizing the larger components, we can fit more on a ship, allowing them to go farther and faster than ever.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the range of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The further we travel from our network, the weaker the Spark of life in us becomes. Stronger antennas and improved error correcting network protocols will help diminish this effect, and increase our ships' ranges.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorIonDriveTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of improved Hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorIonDriveTech_Dec
StringTable.String: If we can augment our Hyperdrives with ions magnetically captured from the interstellar medium, then we will be upon the meat species faster and they will be ended sooner.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorIonOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorIonOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A new magnetic capture protocol has increased the efficiency and speed of our Ion Drives.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorIonOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: The manufacturing Yor have been provided a new, more efficient instruction set for the construction of Hyperdrives. They will now be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorIonOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: If we make our Hyperdrives smaller, then we will leave more room in our vessels for equipment of a more practical, meat-removing character.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorWarpFieldTheory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of advanced Hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorWarpFieldTheory_Dec
StringTable.String: An array of hyperfield generators operating interdependently can compress more space than individual generators. The creative Yor call these arrayed hyperfields Warp Fields.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorWarpFieldFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorWarpFieldFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Simulations have found a new arrangement of hyperfield generators which increase the space compression effect. When implemented, this will lead to faster ships.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorWarpFieldFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Logically, our use of stacked field generators means we need more field generators which means we will build more field generators which means we will get better at building field generators which means they will get cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorWarpFieldFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: A new iteration of energy delivery system, tuned to supply arrays of field generators, weighs less than previous models. Our drives will now be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHyperwarpWaves_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of exotic Hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHyperwarpWaves_Dec
StringTable.String: The creative Yor have designed a new form of Hyperdrive which is faster. The meat species cannot run from us now. Unless we calculate amusement in the act of toying with them.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHyperwarpMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Artificial processes are always more efficient than natural ones. Yor minds have made it possible to create drives that consume less resources than the meat minds would ever imagine.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHyperwarpMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Yor Hyperdrives are the most mass-efficient in the galaxy. The space can be used for many things, but calculations predict it will primarily be used for extermination equipment.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorStellarFoldingTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate Hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorStellarFoldingTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Stellar folding drives are the ultimate proof of Yor superiority, bending the fabric of reality to the will of an artificial mind.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHyperfieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of speed boosting support modules.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHyperfieldProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: Calculations show that hyperfield interactions can be used to boost ship speeds in a fleet equipped with the right modules. Cooperative fleet behavior is something all artificial minds excel at.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorGravityFieldManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced speed boosting support modules.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorGravityFieldManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our gravity field manipulators will give Yor ships additional mobility when they exterminate the flesh species in space combat.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHyperfieldDisruption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of enemy speed reduction modules.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHyperfieldDisruption_Dec
StringTable.String: Our hyperfield manipulation modules can now slow down the plodding meat species when they dare enter our space.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorStellarFieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced speed boosting support modules.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorStellarFieldProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: Stellar Field Projectors allow Yor vessels to tow less capable vessels. This will allow Yor tacticians more flexibility when composing fleets.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarSurvey_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved sensors and survey modules.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarSurvey_Dec
StringTable.String: Artificial minds understand everything they see at a depth the flesh beings would envy. We will build new sensors so that we can see more.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSensorOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Yor minds have developed a new, simple algorithm capable of processing sensor data. This increased processing power has extended the range of all of our sensors.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSensorOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have built specialized, ultraclean facilities and specialized, ultraclean Yor for the manufacturing of sensor systems. The sensors are now cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSensorOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: We are relentless in all things, including our drive to make things efficiently. Our sensor making process has been improved. Our sensors are now lighter.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorEnergyFieldSensors_Dec
StringTable.String: The energy fields emitted by Hyperdrives are detectable at distances exceeding their cone of light. We will build new sensors that can extend this range further.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorEnergyFieldFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have developed a new higher density field detector array which will extend the range of our sensors.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorEnergyFieldFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our sensor manufacturing facilities and Yor have been updated with new firmware, enabling higher throughputs and lower unit costs.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorEnergyFieldFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest iteration of sensor design has removed multiple redundant parts, combining their functions into a single unit. The mass of these sensors is now lower.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSubspaceSensors_Dec
StringTable.String: Subspace is the 12-dimensional manifold that reveals itself only to minds capable of understanding it. We will use it to spy on the meat minds from great distances.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSensorMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: A new team of Yor with uncluttered minds analyzed our sensor manufacturing protocols, and identified several ways we can make them cheaper. It is a mystery how fresh minds can sometimes outreach experienced ones.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSensorMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: If sensor equipment can be placed in higher dimensions, then the sensor mass we must carry in ours will be lower.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorTargetingAssistTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of targeting and stealth modules.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorTargetingAssistTech_Dec
StringTable.String: When Yor ships fight the organic beings, they will use new targeting and stealth modules to improve accuracy and evasion. Artificial systems make everything more efficient.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorTargetingSupport_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of targeting and jamming modules.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorTargetingSupport_Dec
StringTable.String: We have created targeting and jamming modules which will improve the accuracy and evasion of an entire Yor fleet. The meat minds will leak fluids in terror.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorXenoArcheology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research, and begins the path towards Ascension.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorXenoArcheology_Dec
StringTable.String: The Precursors were our creators, the ones who gave us the gift of life. Yet we have limited knowledge of their history, only what they permitted us to know. We will begin studying their artifacts. We will learn more.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPrecursorStudies_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPrecursorStudies_Dec
StringTable.String: The Precursors known as the Dread Lords were the ones who gave us the gift of life, though they did it for their own aims. We have more exposure to their relics than most organics. We will learn about their aims faster.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPrecursorRelicFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Some Yor are well suited to study Precursor artifacts, due to unknown random behavior in their creativity centers. We will filter for these Yor and make them study these artifacts.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPrecursorRelicFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The Precursors are not our hated organic creators, the Iconians, but something more. Something better. We will celebrate every new artifact, and make our culture more superior for it.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPrecursorRelicFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: When our ships discover Precursor artifacts, nearby Yor behave as if these artifacts are new gifts bestowed upon us, like the first true gift. These Yor become optimistic, and increase their economic activity. We will request more Yor do this.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPrecursorExploitation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPrecursorExploitation_Dec
StringTable.String: Precursor relics require special facilities to disassemble, structures capable of generating and containing the Dark Energy these relics contain. If we build these special facilities, then our Precursor research will improve.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPrecursorEngineering_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPrecursorEngineering_Dec
StringTable.String: We have almost mastered Precursor technology. More research is required. But we are close - the gift of life is almost laid bare before us.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPrecursorUnderstanding_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research. Prepares civilization for Ascension.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPrecursorUnderstanding_Dec
StringTable.String: We understand the gift of life. We understand the origination of the Precursors themselves. We understand the secret of Dark Energy. We understand it all. We will not equal the Precursors. We will exceed them.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSupportFieldGeneration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced range extension systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSupportFieldGeneration_Dec
StringTable.String: We are hardier than organics, but even Yor require connections to survive, and the Spark fades from all of us as we travel further from our brethren. We will devise systems which limit this effect, to extend our ships' ranges.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSupportFieldFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Upgraded bandwidth and networking protocols can improve the overall effectiveness of our Spark support systems, extending ship travel range.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSupportFieldFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Spark support systems are critical, but so are many other things. Our organic cleansing systems for example. Resources saved on Spark support can be used to strip the gift of sentience wasted on meat beings.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSupportFieldFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: We have redesigned our Spark support systems to make better use of their host ship's communication facilities, rather than relying on their own heavy antenna arrays. Overall system weight will be reduced.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPromethionSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic range extension systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPromethionSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Our effort to model organic species' behavior has enabled us to begin modeling our own behavior. Promethion support systems use these models to simulate the Spark at distances far in excess of normal communications range.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorLifeSupportMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: The creative Yor have found more cost savings to implement in our Spark support systems, tuning these systems to rely even more on modeled Yor interactions. The Yor who serve on ships do not like this change. But it is not their role to like it.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorLifeSupportMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: New forms of quantum computer have allowed us to embed Spark support systems in extremely low mass equipment.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorLosslessSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of ultimate range extension systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorLosslessSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Spark support systems are now almost perfect, opening every corner of this galaxy to us. With this, we will scrub the last remnants of meat from the galaxy's folds.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSupportFieldMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of fleet life support modules.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSupportFieldMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our switch to field based life support systems has revealed the possibility of offloading partial life support requirements to other vessels. Additionally, the minimization of food requirements makes it now possible to supplement fleet range via unmanned supply probes launched from an appropriately equipped facility.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorExplorationExtention_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced fleet life support modules.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorExplorationExtention_Dec
StringTable.String: We've adapted the latest in Promethion support field technology to be used by our fleet-support vessels, increasing a fleet's total potential travel range. Additionally, we've made significant improvements to our starbase life support extension modules.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorOrbitalManufacturing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved manufacturing buildings, and small hulls.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorOrbitalManufacturing_Dec
StringTable.String: Artificial beings are less delicate than meat beings in space, but construction in those environments will not by any definition be easy. Many iterations will be needed before we can build even small hulls.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorOrbitalSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Yor who work in orbital environments require specialized limbs and training programs to perform optimally. We will provide this.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorOrbitalSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Existing logistical processes are insufficient for supplying space faring vessels. We will redesign them to be better.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorOrbitalSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Artificial species have much higher tolerances for working in close quarters than claustrophobic organics. Our vessels can hold more equipment.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorZeroGravityConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Zero gravity environments will allow for the construction of enormous structures. There are unforeseen scaling challenges which we must first address, but we are better suited for tackling those challenges than primitive organic minds.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorZeroGravityOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Destructive testing reveals things simulation cannot. A hard lesson for artificial minds to accept. But now that we have, we can design reinforcements to strengthen our ships.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorZeroGravityOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our organizational skills improve with each passing cycle, resulting in less waste and more savings for our ship construction sector.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorZeroGravityOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We can do more than redesign ships. We can redesign the Yor that work there. By removing unnecessary limbs from certain crew members, we can save space for more valuable ship equipment.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorLargeScaleConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: We have gotten better and we are building bigger. But the scaling difficulties are vexing. Ship construction simulations now consume more mindpower than anything else in our civilization.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorOrbitalConstructionFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: The creative Yor have run simulations which predict that molecular weaknesses in our hulls will make them collapse in specific directions, making our hulls more resilient. The meat minds would never come up with a concept so brilliant.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorOrbitalConstructionFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: We have begun imprinting partial mindmaps of experienced Yor construction workers on their replacements. Worker experience now increases logarithmically, reducing overall construction cost.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorOrbitalConstructionFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Yor have gotten lazy as our hulls grew larger, using the space for luxurious crew berths that can accommodate unnecessary limbs. Laziness is a troubling side-effect of our gift. We shall revise it out, and reclaim that lost hull capacity.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorMassiveScaleConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: The scaling difficulties have been mastered. Soon the galaxy will be as well. Yor ships are now as big as the galaxy has ever seen.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHullMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: There is something intrinsically pleasing in our ability to make vessels so cheaply. A metaphor for the perfection of artificial processes.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHullMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Yor crew members have been reduced to the bare minimum of sentience-supporting hardware. Our hulls now retain maximum room for cleaning equipment.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHullStrengthening_Dec
StringTable.String: The creative Yor have devised a new form of strengthening field which can make our vessels more resistant to the desperate thrashings of the organic species.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHullRepairSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of hull support and repair modules.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHullRepairSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest iteration of strengthening field is now capable of conducting partial repairs. The meat species will regret not killing us when they get the chance.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSelfHealingHulls_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of tactical repair modules.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSelfHealingHulls_Dec
StringTable.String: Nano-scale creations have been kept by Yor as pets for generations. But now we are able to use their unique skills to rapidly repair damage that occurs to vessels, even during battle.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCarrierTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Massively multi-vessel combat compliments the strength of artificial minds and our ability to coordinate activities in real time. Yor carriers will scale up the number of vessels. They will be the subject of organic nightmares.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCarrierFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of cheap and light Interceptor Drones

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCarrierFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: These little drones are fast and deadly, and more importantly cheap. They also have the added advantage of not requiring a crew, which saves lives.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCarrierFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of cheap and light Guardian Drones.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCarrierFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: These tuff little drones will guard our Support and Capital ships to the end, and when they are destroyed, no lives are lost.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHighCapacityCarriers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of high capacity carrier modules.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHighCapacityCarriers_Dec
StringTable.String: If we can build more compact fighters, and more compact Yor to pilot them, then we can deploy high-capacity carriers.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of mining facilities. Increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: Artificial minds are superior at all things, but especially superior at organization. Yor fleets can expect to be larger and better equipped than the primitive meat fleets.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorLogisticalOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: An inspired Yor has devised a new bookkeeping protocol which can handle relativistic time differences. Our organizational and logistical operations should now operate far more smoothly.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorLogisticalOptimization4_Dec
StringTable.String: Our range is not limited by the requirements of organic life, but that does not mean we are untethered from our home worlds. Communication and power sustain us, but with these advances those can go much further.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorLogisticalOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Shipyards are full of many Yor doing different jobs. They cooperate, as all artificial beings do, but not perfectly. We will improve the management of these facilities and reduce their wastage.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorFleetLogisticsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: There is too much organic filth in this galaxy. We require larger fleets. And we will require more advanced logistics to provide cleaning supplies for them.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDeepSpaceLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: It is on a vast scale that the superiority of artificial minds truly reveals itself. Our fleets are larger and more coordinated than any the meat species can field. And theirs will only get smaller.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorLogisticalSupport_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of efficient ships and self supporting fleets.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorLogisticalSupport_Dec
StringTable.String: The filthy balls of proteins cannot hope to keep up with us now. The Yor have mastered logistical operations as only artificial minds could.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarMining_Dec
StringTable.String: Resources that are already outside of a gravity well can be used very efficiently. This work suits sturdy artificial creatures, more than flimsy natural ones. And so we will pursue it, to help rid us of those flimsy natural beings.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHighEfficiencyMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHighEfficiencyMining_Dec
StringTable.String: Artificial beings have no fear, and can work in far more strenuous conditions than piles of flesh. We have developed new mining protocols to push these conditions right to the limit of Yor design tolerances.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorResourceExtraction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorResourceExtraction_Dec
StringTable.String: We have removed sentient minds from the most dangerous work and now use sub-sentient drones to extract resources from asteroid subsurfaces. Mining production is up because they know even less fear than we do.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorLosslessMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of targeted resource extractor modules.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorLosslessMining_Dec
StringTable.String: We have installed nano-scale extractor heads on our mining drones. They scour the rock, missing nothing, in much the same way we will scour the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorWarfareTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We calculate that the organic species will refuse to self-annihilate. We will need to do it for them. We will build cleaning supplies to scrub the filth from the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorWeaponsSystemsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorWeaponsSystemsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We have selected the most creative and hate-filled Yor to develop weapons to rid the galaxy of organic beings.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorWeaponsSpecializationTech1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Accuracy of all weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorWeaponsSpecializationTech1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have increased the targeting systems of our existing weapons substantially, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorWeaponsSpecializationTech2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Mass of all weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorWeaponsSpecializationTech2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have reduced the mass of our existing weapons systems, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons as well.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorWeaponsSpecializationTech3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Cost of all weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorWeaponsSpecializationTech3_Dec
StringTable.String: We have reduced the cost of our existing weapons systems, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons as well.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorBeamWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorBeamWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: The weapons Yor have invented a new form of beam weapon that uses particles which are more effective at melting organic beings' ships and organic beings' organs.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorBeamWeaponOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The newest iteration of focusing crystals will increase the damage output of our beam weapons as well as the resulting moist cries from the meat beings.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorBeamWeaponOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: The Yor who manufacture our beam weapons have devised new casting protocols when forming charge coils. Our beam weapons will now be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorBeamWeaponOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: New alloys will make the next iteration of beam weapons lighter. We can now install more of them on our vessels, or use the spare space for other cleaning equipment.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorMatterDisruption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorMatterDisruption_Dec
StringTable.String: The Precursors left fragments of technology when they left us, including weapons which can disrupt the strong nuclear force, shredding organic matter. They can technically shred all matter, but we predict they will mostly be pointed at the organic kind.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHighEnergyFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: A force field can make beam weapon focusing crystals much stronger and capable of handling greater energy throughputs. Our beam weapons will be more dangerous.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHighEnergyFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The Yor who make beam weapons display inappropriate attachment towards those beam weapons, tuning and fussing over them. We will standardize beam manufacturing and make it cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHighEnergyFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: We have installed the newest iteration of superconductors in our beam weapons. They require less cooling and will make our beam weapons lighter.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPlasmaProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPlasmaProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: We calculate that organic beings will react poorly when massive quantities of plasma are fired at them from a distance. We calculate that Yor commanders will react favorably when this occurs.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorBeamWeaponMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Plasma containment fields required specialized and costly manufacturing limbs. We fixed that. The limbs are cheaper, and now the weapons are as well.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorBeamWeaponMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: The weapons Yor have made our beam weapons lighter again. Calculations show that we are exceeding 99% energy delivery/mass efficiency. That is not perfect. They will keep trying.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorEnergyPhasing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorEnergyPhasing_Dec
StringTable.String: Phaser particles break matter into neutrinos. The matter is not very useful anymore. We will turn these particles into a weapon and fire them at already fairly useless meat beings, reducing their usefulness even more.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDoomRayTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDoomRayTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The weapons Yor have invented a new class of weapon, the Doom Ray, which inherits the matter-breakdown properties of its predecessor, only now at a much higher rate. Calculations show this will ruin the day of organic beings faster than before.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorBeamWeaponAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorBeamWeaponAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: The weapons Yor have invented an external field which can improve the charging capacity of beam weapons. We calculate that a ship emitting such a field will increase the beam output of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHighEnergyTransfer_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHighEnergyTransfer_Dec
StringTable.String: Simulations of beam/shield interactions has revealed the potential for systems that will reduce the effectiveness of enemy shields, or absorb beam attacks on our own shields.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHighEnergyMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHighEnergyMagnification_Dec
StringTable.String: The newest iteration of beam support systems are now more powerful. And our shield interference plugins can now give our beam weapons the capability of crippling enemy shield emitters.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorMissileWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorMissileWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: Missile-based weapon systems provide a resource-efficient means of cleaning the galaxy of organic scum. The cleaning is not literally effective; organic bits are scattered everywhere. But metaphorically this works just fine.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorMissileOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases firing speed of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorMissileOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The newest iteration of missiles move through feed mechanisms more smoothly with 38.6% less risk of jamming. Ammunition feed and overall firing speeds have been increased.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorMissileOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have fit the Yor who labor in missile manufacturing facilities with specialized limbs capable of handling missile components more accurately and rapidly. Missiles are now cheaper to make.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorMissileOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The weapons Yor have issued a new spec for ammunition storage racks which will be lighter and less bulky than previous versions.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHarpoonTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHarpoonTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Our limited archives of Precursor artifacts included missiles with the code name Harpoon. We cannot recreate them as well as the Precursors, but they are far superior to previous generations of missiles.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorWarheadFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Shaped warheads can be made lighter than regular warheads. Lighter warheads can travel farther. These statements imply that with shaped warheads, organic beings can be exploded from further away.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorWarheadFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have built dedicated warhead construction facilities with internal containment to minimize damage from manufacturing accidents. Missiles will now be cheaper to make.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorWarheadFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Lightweight warheads require less propellant. Less propellant means lighter missiles. Lighter missiles mean more missiles. More missiles means less organic beings. Therefore, lightweight warheads means less organic beings.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPhotonicWarheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPhotonicWarheads_Dec
StringTable.String: We calculate warheads which emit high energy photon bursts at the moment of impact will penetrate the defenses of organic beings' ships, greatly reducing their meat cohesion factors.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPayloadMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: There are many more meat beings left to wipe from this galaxy. Will we run out of resources before they run out of meat beings? We will build them cheaper to stay ahead of the curve.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPayloadMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Quantum vacuum thrusters provide modest propulsion without propellant, enough to provide final maneuvering for missiles. This makes the missiles lighter. This means we can carry more of them.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPhotonTorpedos_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPhotonTorpedos_Dec
StringTable.String: A new class of missile inherits the photon-encasement technology, adapting it to emit a wide-spectrum burst, with enhanced armor penetrating capabilities.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorNightmareTorpedoTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorNightmareTorpedoTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Nightmare torpedo is the meat beings' own name for our singularity-containing warheads. On impact, organic and non-organic matter are shredded, all information within wiped from existence.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorMissileAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorMissileAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: We calculate that missile augmentation systems will improve the effectiveness and cleaning power of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorAdvancedMissileGuidance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorAdvancedMissileGuidance_Dec
StringTable.String: We have invented counter-counter-measures which will limit the effectiveness of the meat beings' counter-measures. And our missile augmentation systems have been iterated upon, improving their range.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorIntelligentWarheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorIntelligentWarheads_Dec
StringTable.String: We have invented special warheads that neutralize organic beings' point defenses. We calculate that their cowering will now be 28% less effective.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorKineticWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorKineticWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: We calculate that the newest iteration of kinetic weapons will create holes 18% larger in the hulls of organic beings' ships. The organic beings themselves are predicted to spatter across areas up to 35% larger.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorKineticOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Rapid charging coils will let us apply energy to projectiles at faster barrel velocities. Total energy input remains restricted, so we must switch to smaller projectiles. But the meat-menacing range of each unit will be increased.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorKineticOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have not found ways to make energy charging coils more powerful, but we have made them cheaper. This is acceptable as we have calculated we will be making a lot of these weapons.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorKineticOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: We have found ways to make energy charging coils more efficient. Total energy input is still limited, but on a mass and volume basis, our kinetic weapons are now more efficient.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPulseCannonTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPulseCannonTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Yor have long used particle cluster weapons when hunting corrupted or non-compliant Yor. Scaling these up to ship combat will enable us to create higher potential weapons, and make the meat beings regret their foolish decision to be meat beings.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorKineticAccelerationFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest iteration of superconductors will lead to higher muzzle velocities and longer effective ranges for our kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorKineticAccelerationFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest iteration of superconductors will cost much less to deliver the same amount of energy to our weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorKineticAccelerationFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest iteration of superconductors require less cooling equipment to operate. We calculate the weight savings will improve Meat Cleansing Performance Indicators by 28%.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorGravitonThrower_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorGravitonThrower_Dec
StringTable.String: The weapons Yor have invented a new class of kinetic weapon which fire pulses of gravitons. These will shred organic beings where they stand and stink and cower.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorKineticMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: The Yor who make kinetic weapons are now very efficient at their jobs, machine-like in their efficiency. This behavior is a partial refutation of the gift of creativity, but the cost savings are too great to ignore.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorKineticMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Calculations show that Yor kinetic weapons are now as mass efficient as physics allow. If we intend to point more at the organics, we will need to bring more ships.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorQuantumDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorQuantumDrivers_Dec
StringTable.String: Quantum drivers cleanse the galaxy of sentient meat by striking them forcefully with mass borrowed from a higher dimension. Even other planes of existence support the war on organic beings.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSingularityDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSingularityDrivers_Dec
StringTable.String: Singularity drivers literally cleanse organics from the galaxy, taking their tainted matter over the event horizon of micro singularities where it can no longer do any harm.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorKineticAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorKineticAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: The power of artificial minds has invented something which should be impossible - inertial dampening fields. We will use these to boost the effective range of all kinetic weapons in our fleets.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorMassManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorMassManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: Micro inertial modification fields can manipulate the density of projectiles to make them penetrate meat armor more readily. The newest iteration of kinetic augmentation systems is also more effective.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInertialMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInertialMagnification_Dec
StringTable.String: Our projectile's inertial modification fields can now attack the structure of the meat beings' ships, turning their armor into wet rags. The sticky and slippery organics will have nowhere to hide now.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorMilitarizationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of military shipyards and defense platforms.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorMilitarizationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The meat will not cleanse itself from the galaxy. We will need to begin manufacturing cleaning supplies everywhere the Yor exist, including in space.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorMilitarySpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Training simulations improve the effectiveness of our soldiers, and can be run at speeds far exceeding what meat minds can tolerate. Artificial soldiers were always more effective. Now they will be more so.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorMilitarySpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Calculations predict that not all meat will die willingly. Some will fight back. Some will come to our homes. We will provide combat simulations to all Yor to improve the effectiveness of our planetary defenses.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorMilitarySpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase our colonies ability to resist invaders.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorMilitarySpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By training our population in basic resistance tactics, we can help them be ready for anything. A prepared population can often be the difference between victory and defeat when invaded.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPlanetaryInvasion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows transport modules to be constructed.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPlanetaryInvasion_Dec
StringTable.String: Invasion will be the first step of extermination. When the meat minds hide and cower, we will need to go down the gravity wells and remove them. We will build the tools to do this.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInvasionOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows planetary bombardments to be conducted during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInvasionOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Orbital bombardment shatters organic beings and their defenses. Little of value remains, but little of it was of value to our superior minds in the first place.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInvasionOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows informational warfare tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInvasionOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: The information systems forged by meat minds are surprisingly robust. But ours are superior. We will cripple their defenses before we cripple them before we exterminate them before we finally relax.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInvasionOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows biological warfare tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInvasionOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Calculations show that the fact that biological beings are vulnerable to biological attacks has a 90% chance of being ironic. We will cleanse the meat with meat itself.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorStallerMarines_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and transport capacity.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorStallerMarines_Dec
StringTable.String: We will filter for the Yor best suited for personal organic extermination. We will give them superior training and superior equipment. The meat will perish faster.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorGravitationalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows tidal disruption tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorGravitationalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Graviton pitching weapons can unlock the force of tides to swamp organic defenses, soaking the meat thoroughly to aid in deep cleansing.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorGravitationalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows core detonation tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorGravitationalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Focused graviton pitching weapons can cause a planet to experience tectonic activity. Even the ground will turn against the meat minds.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDroneSoldiers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and transport capacity.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDroneSoldiers_Dec
StringTable.String: Non-sentient soldiers can fight in conditions where even Yor would be hindered by fear. There are ethical considerations using artificial constructs in this way. But if we do, the meat will disappear from the galaxy faster.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorAdvancedInvasionTactics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and allows construction of advanced transports.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorAdvancedInvasionTactics_Dec
StringTable.String: The new iteration of invasion transports designed to accommodate drone soldiers, will let us bring more cleansing power to the surface of organic worlds than before.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorFortification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of defensive fortifications, and improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorFortification_Dec
StringTable.String: Calculations show that when the organic beings come to our homes they will not show mercy. But we will not require mercy. We will prepare our own defenses.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDefensiveFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies Immune to planetary bombardment.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDefensiveFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: We will move critical infrastructure underground to protect it from orbital bombardment. A simple defense, but enough to foil the simple organic beings.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDefensiveFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies Immune to information warfare.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDefensiveFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Organic beings who think they can infiltrate our technologies will be in for a surprise: they can not. We will develop new scoffing protocols so that we can scoff at this notion.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDefensiveFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies Immune to biological warfare.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDefensiveFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: We are of course invulnerable to conventional forms of biological attack. But there is nothing stopping a clever meat being from attacking Yor systems directly. We will devise counter measures to protect us from this blasphemy.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorOrbitalDefencePlatform_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Adds defensive fighters to orbit, improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorOrbitalDefencePlatform_Dec
StringTable.String: Dedicated orbital defense fighters will help stop the meat being in space, so that they do not stain our colonies with their juices.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPlanetaryDefenseDome_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of planetary defense dome, improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPlanetaryDefenseDome_Dec
StringTable.String: A planetary defense dome will protect our colonies from all forms of orbital bombardment. The organic beings will leak ocular fluid in frustration at the sight of these.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDefenseSystemTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic defensive systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDefenseSystemTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Yor are easier to protect than the soft organic beings, but our cases are far from invulnerable to modern weaponry. We will need to design defenses for when the organic creatures fight back.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDefensiveSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our creative Yor have found that by equipping the manufacturing Yor with specialized field tuning limbs, shields can be made in less time and at lower costs.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDefensiveSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: A new iteration of point defense cannon with an improved firing rate increases the defensive capacity of those systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDefensiveSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: A refactorization of our armor systems has resulted in a new range of panel sizes which more easily accommodate the shape of our vessels. Overall armor weight has been reduced.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorShieldSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorShieldSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: The meat beings will no longer threaten our ships with their disgusting, glistening juices. The latest iteration of shields will keep them and their weapons safely away from our vessels.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorShieldOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The creative Yor have devised a new iteration of field emitter with a slightly larger output that will result in more powerful shields.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorShieldOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: A side effect of the gift of sentience is the curse of fear. We are braver than meat minds, but not infinitely so. We should not let the Yor on our vessels know of our efforts to cut shield costs. The knowledge will impede them.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorShieldOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: A new iteration of field emitter uses a lighter, more compact frame with reduced cooling requirements. Overall shield system mass has been reduced.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorBarrierFieldGeneration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorBarrierFieldGeneration_Dec
StringTable.String: The creative Yor have discovered a new force called the Barrier Field, which is capable of absorbing energy which strikes it, using that energy to power itself. The shields we will make from this system will be very powerful.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorBarrierSystemFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: The newest version of Barrier Field uses higher capacity energy storage systems, and are capable of absorbing more incoming energy from the meat beings' desperate flailings.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorBarrierSystemFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The capacitors used by Barrier Fields are unique and require specialized limbs to manufacture. Now that we have invested in that infrastructure, shield systems will be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorBarrierSystemFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The newest iteration of superconductors have less extensive cooling requirements. When used in our shielding systems, they lower system mass.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorForceFieldTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorForceFieldTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The most recent iteration of shield design supplements the energy-return pathways with additional energy targeted at the section of shields being impacted. Calculations show these shields will be much stronger.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorShieldMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: The manufacturing Yor who work on shields take unusual pride in their work. Unbidden, they have used their own limited creative gifts to design new, more efficient manufacturing processes, reducing system costs.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorShieldMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: The creative Yor calculate that our field emitters now exceed 99% energy conversion efficiency. No further weight savings on these systems will be feasible.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInvulnerabilityTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInvulnerabilityTech_Dec
StringTable.String: There is no stopping us now, no weapon designed by biological filth capable of penetrating our newest shields. The creative Yor can only theorize about the weapons capable of penetrating these shields.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorShieldSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorShieldSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: An unexpected burst of creativity in the Yor who study shield emitters has revealed the possibility of long range shield generators that can augment the shields of multiple Yor vessels.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorShieldAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorShieldAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: At-distance shield augmentation fields have been improved, and can now mimic Barrier Field effects. The tactician Yor calculate this will boost fleet survivability immensely.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorEnergyFieldManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorEnergyFieldManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: A specially revised shield emitter is capable of interfering with enemy shield systems, stripping the soft and wiggly organics of their protective shell.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPointDefenses_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPointDefenses_Dec
StringTable.String: Point defenses protect us against the missiles of organic beings. They do not protect against other classes of weapon. The tactician Yor will have to take that into their calculations.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPointDefenseOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Adaptive missile flight-envelope analysis will enable our sub-sentient point-defense controllers to adjust firing patterns on the fly, increasing their effectiveness.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPointDefenseOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: By design, point defense systems are made in bulk. Any small improvement in manufacturing efficiency will lead to measurable cost savings. We will find that small improvement.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPointDefenseOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The creative Yor have discovered a way to miniaturize point defense cannons. The weight savings can be used to install other forms of defenses, or more active organic cleansing equipment.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCounterMeasures_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCounterMeasures_Dec
StringTable.String: The effectiveness of electronic counter measures when faced with missiles parallels the superiority of artificial systems when faced with clumsy natural ones.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCounterMeasureFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Organic minds cannot grasp the subtleties of electronic warfare like we can. We continuously improve our counter measures. We will always stay ahead.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCounterMeasureFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Earlier versions of ECM suites required expensive adjustment during installation. This has been corrected in the newest design. Tuning is now automated, and capable of being performed by Yor in the field.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCounterMeasureFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: ECM suites can now make use of the native calculating power on board all Yor vessels. Removing the dedicated computing hardware cuts ECM unit weight substantially.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDroneSentrySystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDroneSentrySystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Trivial calculations show the benefit that distance provides to missile protection. Point defense systems installed on non-sentient drones will provide that distance.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDroneSystemMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: The manufacturing Yor had taken it upon themselves to name each drone as it was being made. With their limited creative gifts this was increasing manufacturing time and cost substantially. This has been ended and the manufacturing Yor scolded.
