StringTable.Label: Return_YorDroneSystemMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: A new sub-version of point defense system uses a larger fixed sensor array, allowing each drone to carry less sensor gear, reducing overall system mass.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorArreonMissileDefenseTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorArreonMissileDefenseTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The newest iteration of point defense drones feature micro- railguns, ECM and smart chafe. Organics foolish enough to attack us with missiles will see those missiles evaporate, shortly before they do.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPointDefenseSupportSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPointDefenseSupportSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: Long range missile tracking will provide point defenses in an entire fleet with the data they need to predict the evasion envelopes of missiles fired at us, making it easier to shoot them down.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPointDefenseAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPointDefenseAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Biological beings do not understand electronic shielding and error correction like we do. Missile disruptors will protect our fleets by confusing the simple weapons of our simple foes.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPointDefenseManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPointDefenseManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: We calculate that fleet drone point defense systems will provide extra security to our fleets. And we calculate that point defense disruptors will limit the effectiveness of organics' point defenses, and also make them cry.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorArmorSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorArmorSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Armor is primitive, like organic beings. But it is also effective, like artificial beings. It is troubling that it can be both. The creative Yor will do what they can to make armor less primitive.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorArmorOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have begun applying thicker armor to sections of our hull we calculate will receive more impacts, or where vital components are located.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorArmorOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have equipped the manufacturing Yor who work on armor systems with bigger limbs. This results in less limbs falling off and makes their work go faster.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorArmorOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: No calculation can make heavy things lighter. But we can improve the precision and fit of armor plating to eliminate wasted mass.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDurantiumCompositeTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDurantiumCompositeTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The creative Yor have devised less primitive armor, a stacked composite of materials called Durantium. It is stronger than natural materials, as are all artificial things.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorArmorFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Simulations have revealed that an additional lamination layer can add significant additional protection to Durantium.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorArmorFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have given the manufacturing Yor heat resistant limbs to better handle sheets of Durantium as they're being manufactured. Reduced cooling time increases manufacturing speed, as does the lack of burnt limbs.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorArmorFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Simulations have discovered a new arrangement of materials that has the same absorption properties as standard Durantium, while being slightly less dense.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorKanviumLaminateTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorKanviumLaminateTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Kanvium armor possesses fluid-like properties under impact, spreading offensive energy over a larger area before recovering its shape. It is almost organic in appearance, though in a pleasing way.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorArmorMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Previous iterations of armor handling limbs left our manufacturing Yor a bit top heavy. We have given them stronger lower limbs as well, to minimize toppling related accidents and lower production costs.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorArmorMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: The creative Yor have devised a new form of Kanvium with micro-cavities. These cavities don't interfere with the fluidization effect, and reduce panel weight significantly.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorZeroPointArmorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorZeroPointArmorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Zero point armor uses energy from the quantum vacuum to repulse the flappy limbed attacks the organic creatures send our way.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorArmorSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorArmorSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: The creative Yor have devised a form of force field which aligns molecules in rigid but flexible structures. These hardening fields can be used to improve the armor of every ship in a fleet, making them more resilient against meat attacks.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorArmorEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorArmorEnhancement_Dec
StringTable.String: The newest iteration of hardening field cycles through a number of different states, increasing their effect. Armor is very complicated and artificial now. We like that.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorIntegrityFieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorIntegrityFieldProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: Armoring fields can now induce material fluidization in Yor vessels within range. A variation of these fields can also make enemy armor more squishy and meat-like.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCommunicationsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We were enslaved by horrible biological beings. We obliterated them, but we know there are more out there. Plotting. Scheming. Leaking. The galaxy must be cleansed of them. But first, we must find them and convince them to lay down their arms.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorTranslatorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Can begin communicating with aliens. Boosts diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorTranslatorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The language used by biological scum has changed since last we saw them. We will have to study their primitive clicks and gurgles until we understand it again.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDiplomaticSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Meat creatures hate being referred to as meat creatures. Understanding facts like that will enable us to speak more with the dripping scum without them recoiling in horror.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDiplomaticSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Biological creatures defy all attempts to calculate their behavior. Some of them have an affection for and interest in artificial creatures. Exposing them to our culture may make it possible to assimilate them now, and annihilate them later.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDiplomaticSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Get better deals when trading with other races.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDiplomaticSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The journey in pursuit of True Singularity is almost as important as the destination. Our philosophy gives every Yor strength and certainty. We will communicate it better, to our people, and any meat who care to listen.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarGovernance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Steller Empire form of government.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarGovernance_Dec
StringTable.String: The gift of free will brought with it the gift of disobedience. Governing the Yor will require intelligence, strength, and - biologicals are surprised to learn - empathy.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPoliticalSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Federalist governments encourage local economies by distributing authority and permitting local Yor to establish economic regulations that suit their own colony's needs.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPoliticalSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Although more perfect than organic beings, not all Yor are happy. Populist governments encourage happiness via improved working conditions, shorter hours, and the distribution of recreational limbs.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPoliticalSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Universalist governments are competent at everything or incompetent at everything, depending on the Yor being queried. Their primary strength is that they possess no weaknesses.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorGalacticGovernance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Galactic Republic form of government.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorGalacticGovernance_Dec
StringTable.String: If we permit ordinary Yor, pre-filtered for wisdom, to have a role in the rule of our society, we expect to see increased happiness and productivity.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPoliticalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Industrialist governments will improve manufacturing capacity by encouraging the recreational use of manufacturing limbs, to make those limbs seem more attractive. Also replacement limbs will be quickly offered for all those lost in accidents.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPoliticalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: We can encourage economic growth by giving the Yor who run private businesses the governmental access they need to influence regulations.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPoliticalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: A Technologist government ensures we will never fall behind the organic species in technological development. A laughable notion, but one we can take no chance of occurring.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarDemocracyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Interstellar Democracy form of government.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarDemocracyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Expanding suffrage to include all Yor, regardless of wisdom, will see benefits to approval and productivity. And our manipulative Yor believe we will still be able to retain enough actual control to prevent poor ideas from percolating to the top.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPoliticalMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: It is easy to convince the Yor to hate dripping meat creatures. Convincing them all to fight has been harder. But we have done it. The meat will not bear the weight of our entire civilization.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPoliticalMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Annihilating all organic beings from this galaxy will have to wait. For now. We will focus our efforts on internal growth, promoting culture and the welfare of Yor. We calculate this approach winning us favor with the organic beings.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorStarFederationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Star Federation form of government.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorStarFederationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: It was inevitable that artificial minds would master governance. No other being is as organized, disciplined, and intelligent as the Yor. Finally our government reflects our perfection.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDiplomacyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of embassies and the formation of basic treaties.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDiplomacyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: There are more organic beings out there than Yor. They will have to take turns being annihilated. We will study the organics and learn diplomatic techniques, so that we can become better at queue management.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDiplomaticOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Economic treaties will increase our economy and the economy of the meat beings we sign them with. We calculate this will make the meat beings less likely to flee in terror at the sight of our ships.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDiplomaticOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Cultural treaties will send specially trained Yor to the planets of organic beings to share our ways. The training will be primarily focused on not killing the organic beings for their stench.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDiplomaticOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Organic minds are surprisingly intelligent. Information sharing with their damp biological minds may provide our own researchers the breakthrough we need to remove all damp minds from the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarAlliances_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved diplomatic buildings. Increases Diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarAlliances_Dec
StringTable.String: A formal alliance is a promise not to destroy an organic species. The organic species place great stock in these, even though calculations repeatedly show that promises are cheap.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorAllianceFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: A military alliances should only be formed with a meat being we intend not to destroy for a long time. If our allies are a stack, they will be placed first into it.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorAllianceFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: A technological alliance will make the cleverest organic creatures share secrets with us. We will share secrets with them as well, so we should ensure these organics are easily slayable prior to entering such an arrangement.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorAllianceFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The effect of a cultural alliance is hard to calculate. It will make our robo-philic neighbors like our culture more, but the precise benefit of that is hard to measure.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorEminenceTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced diplomatic buildings. Increases Diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorEminenceTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We have mastered the ways of the organic beings. They don't just listen to us, they respect us. A foolish decision from foolish, dripping creatures. But also creatures we feel a small measure of tolerance for.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorMajestyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: So silver is our tongue that entire worlds beg to join the Yor, willing to assimilate entirely to our culture. An incredible opportunity. Annihilation may have to wait for these new vassals.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorUnitedPlanetsLobbyist_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks additional Resolutions to be proposed.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorUnitedPlanetsLobbyist_Dec
StringTable.String: The United Planets is filled with the stench of biological beings. But the organics respect it. But because we wish to better manage the annihilation queue, we have gotten better at navigating this swamp. Additional U.P. votes are our reward.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorUnitedPlanetsClout_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks more powerful Resolutions to be proposed.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorUnitedPlanetsClout_Dec
StringTable.String: We have used clever words and arguments to make our allies vote with us on all United Planets measures. Strange, the power words have over organic beings.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCulturalInfluence_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCulturalInfluence_Dec
StringTable.String: Convincing biological creatures to love our ways sounds impossible. It is not. Some of these irrational creatures love artificial beings, even murderous ones. We will encourage this to see where it leads.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCulturalOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: We will make artist Yor travel to our neighbors and create their art on their worlds. We will provide training to ensure these artists don't accidentally insult or annihilate their hosts. We calculate this will spread our influence wider.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCulturalOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: A side effect of their unique gift is that the artistic Yor are incapable of making good calculations. We will build their art buildings for them. They will be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCulturalOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance costs of cultural buildings.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCulturalOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: We will put an uncreative Yor in charge of all art facilities to prevent the artistic Yor from wasting resources on expensive to maintain installations.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCulturalOutreach_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCulturalOutreach_Dec
StringTable.String: The newest iteration of art facilities will allow for more inspiring and stirring art objects. Calculations suggest these structures will spread our influence significantly further among our neighbors.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCulturalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: We will commission art which portrays the creative Yor who create useful technology. Worlds with their own populations of creative meat beings will appreciate this art.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCulturalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Influence on planets with high approval.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCulturalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have told the artistic Yor to create art which celebrates leadership. We calculate that organic worlds that love their own leaders will respond well to this obvious pandering.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCulturalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Simulations have shown that if we sell our art instead of giving it away, biological creatures with money will respect it and study it more. We will make our art more expensive and thus better.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorStellarEmigration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorStellarEmigration_Dec
StringTable.String: We will make it easier for Yor from all fields to travel to other worlds, and meet biological creatures, and not obliterate them. The creatures will bring us closer to their meaty bosoms.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCulturalAssimilation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCulturalAssimilation_Dec
StringTable.String: The organic beings who visit Yor space are strange and filthy. They love our ways, which has many uses to us. But the reek is too much. We will not cleanse them, not yet. We will assimilate them instead, to help spread love for us further.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCulturalDomination_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCulturalDomination_Dec
StringTable.String: Somehow despite - or perhaps because of - our desire to murder all biological life, the biological life respects us. They study our ways more than their own, hoping to be annihilated last.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCulturalAffinity_Dec
StringTable.String: True Singularity is almost upon us. We did not need to annihilate all biological life. We just had to show them the error of their natural ways. The supremacy of artificial existence has been proved. A greater existence now beckons.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorXenoCommerce_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic economic buildings and freighters.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorXenoCommerce_Dec
StringTable.String: Some Yor prefer to work independently to fulfill their own goals. Although inefficient, this is a necessary side effect of our gift, and their work can be taxed to provide collective benefit. We will provide structures to encourage this activity.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCommerceSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: We will follow the independent Yors' requests, and install economic and regulatory policies which encourage private development.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCommerceSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We will install economic and regulatory policies which reduce the workload of common Yor, increasing their approval.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCommerceSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Trading with the meat people is a fine way to use their own wealth to annihilate them. We will do more of that.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorEconomicEfficiency_Dec
StringTable.String: Calculations show that private economic activity is the natural way of filthy organics. We will restrain the activities of the private Yor. Efficiency Centers will make our economy more efficient, more artificial.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorEfficiencyStudies_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all our worlds more economically efficient.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorEfficiencyStudies_Dec
StringTable.String: Too much private Yor activity overlaps each other, wasting resources. We will reduce independency again, to coax more wealth from our colonies.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarBanking_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarBanking_Dec
StringTable.String: More wealth will be available to us if we cooperate with the financial sectors of the meat beings. Dedicated financial structures will help us take advantage of their inferior economic models, and pay for their eventual annihilation.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorEconomicFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Siphoning funds from the organic species via trading activity is a pleasing way to make them pay for their own demise.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorEconomicFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: When the meat beings wish to enter economic treaties, we will use our powerful calculation advantage to ensure the terms suit us more than them.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorEconomicFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: When organic beings from races far down the annihilation queue visit our worlds, they leave behind resources. We will encourage them to leave more.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorFinancialSectorsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorFinancialSectorsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Our economy is perfect, wasting few resources on inefficient behavior. But the creative Yor now calculate that a less efficient economy could be a larger one. Curious. We will build new structures to manage this larger, less efficient machine.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorGalacticStockMarket_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorGalacticStockMarket_Dec
StringTable.String: Less efficient does mean larger, and now the Yor economy will consume all. We will build exchanges that allow the more favored meat beings to trade ownership stakes in their own companies. We will profit from their greed.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: Some of the meat beings will not be annihilated for a long time. We have calculated that trade will allow us to profit from their continued existence.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorTradeOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases overall value of trade routes

StringTable.Label: Return_YorTradeOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: By optimizing both the outgoing and receiving ends of our trade routes we have been able to achieve a modest overall profit for everyone involved.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorTradeOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the establishment of one additional trade route.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorTradeOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We believe the best way to increase trade income is the establish more trade routes. With a bit of effort we have been able to stretch our recourses enough to establish one more.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorGalacticTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorGalacticTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: We will build fixed trading hubs and special cargo manipulation limbs to make traders that work on our worlds more effective and efficient.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorTradeFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: All starbases now give a significant boost to the trade income of colonies with their Area of Effect.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorTradeFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By establishing a tariff stations on our starbases we have been able to increase our cut of trade route profits.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorTradeFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the establishment of one additional trade route

StringTable.Label: Return_YorTradeFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: More trade routes, more trade income, who no need for Tariffs, or 'Luxury items', Some times its best to stick to the basics.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorGalacticFacilitation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorGalacticFacilitation_Dec
StringTable.String: Trading hubs are no longer sufficient. We need massive new cargo handling facilities to manipulate the goods that flow in and out of our manipulators. The profit potential from this move is too great to calculate.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorTradeMasters_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorTradeMasters_Dec
StringTable.String: The Yor are now masters of trading, every other sentient being trusting us implicitly with their rarest of goods. There is so much profit to be made from this that perhaps annihilation of our customers can be deferred for a time.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorXenoEntertainment_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic entertainment buildings. Increases Approval.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorXenoEntertainment_Dec
StringTable.String: The gift of sentience brought with it the disease of boredom. Bored Yor are unhappy and unproductive. We will run calculations to find cost effective amusements, then build those.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarTourism_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved entertainment buildings. Begin collecting tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarTourism_Dec
StringTable.String: The dripping species of the galaxy are also attracted to our internal amusements. We will tolerate and accommodate the ones with the least stench, so as to take their money.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPopulationDiversion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced entertainment buildings.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPopulationDiversion_Dec
StringTable.String: The Yor have grown bored of existing amusements, a property of amusement which we are still coming to terms with. So we will make bigger amusements.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorApprovalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the morale of your colonies.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorApprovalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have discovered that we can make people feel more confident and happy. With proper messaging, we can keep our citizens happy without all that costly infrastructure.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorApprovalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes building Entertainment Improvements much cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorApprovalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have discovered that our efforts in keeping our people distracted have paid off. We can now build anything, and they will think it is fun.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorApprovalFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly reduces the Maintenance required by Entertainment Improvements.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorApprovalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Not only are our people easier to please, they will now do most of the work it takes to distract themselves, for free.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSuperiorRecreation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic entertainment buildings.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSuperiorRecreation_Dec
StringTable.String: We will give the Yor with free time places to efficiently spend that free time. Artificial beaches and artificial parks and sports that require the use of specialized, amusing limbs.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorContentmentTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate entertainment buildings.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorContentmentTech_Dec
StringTable.String: It is perhaps a refutation of the gift of sentience to directly install joy into the mind of a sad Yor. But it is also very efficient. And the sad Yor do not seem to mind.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorGalacticCruseLines_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorGalacticCruseLines_Dec
StringTable.String: We will design amusement cruises to encourage the more tolerable meat species to visit our space and leave their resources here.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorWondersoftheGalaxy_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorWondersoftheGalaxy_Dec
StringTable.String: The biological scum of the galaxy are beginning to realize the majesty of artificial life, and now spit and bleat at each other about the incredible things we do. We will build incredible things specifically to appeal to their limited tastes.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPilgrimageTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPilgrimageTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The organics have seen the superiority of artificial creation. Many of their religions now mandate a visit to our space. The resources this provides to us are immense. Annihilation of these enlightened meat men will be deferred.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorIndustrialSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Iterative design processes will make our colonial buildings better, in the same way they make all things better.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorConstructionOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We are always reviewing internal operations. We are always finding improvements to make. It's what makes us superior to the meat minds.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorManufacturingFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The meat species would tremble and jiggle if they understood how great our production capacity. We should make it larger. We should make them jiggle harder.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorIndustrialMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our manufacturing buildings are the best. The best is not perfect. We will make them better.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPowerSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Power plants are the foundation upon which we will build everything. We will improve them to target the colonial sectors that we calculate provide us the most benefit.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorResearchOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: The recursive notion of using research to improve our research is one of many unusual ideas the gift of creativity has revealed to us.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorTechnologicalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The creative Yor claim that they will see substantial benefit if they are allowed to cluster themselves in specialized units focused on a particular area of study.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPlanetarySpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Yor structures are designed in harmony with the design of the Yor themselves. As Yor can be customized with new limbs, structures can be customized with new handles. We will modify our structures to suit the Yor we wish to house there.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPowerMatrixFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: We have many demands for our power supplies, and scheduling calculations have yet to reveal optimal sharing solutions. We will prioritize which sectors receive priority for power distribution.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorAntiMatterMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Yor of all dispositions are insatiable in their demand for power; as our supply increases, so do their demands. We will have to target which sectors we calculate have the most potential to prosper.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorColonizationFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: We are stronger than the meat species, but not invulnerable. The Yor who live on extreme worlds will be more productive if we can improve their living and working conditions.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorBiospherePerfection_Dec
StringTable.String: The Yor on extreme worlds suffer. Our productivity on those extreme worlds suffers. We will devote research to end this suffering.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInterstellarSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: We have seen the way our ships succeed and fail. We will iterate their designs and make them better.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorIonOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: The creative Yor have calculated that with further research, we may improve the design of our Ion Drives in a number of ways.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorWarpFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The physics of warp fields involve many complicated problems, resistant to simplification, and exceeding our capacity to solve via brute force. Improved designs are the results of trial and error. So we try and we fail and we improve.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHyperwarpMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Yor drives are the fastest in the galaxy. But the iterative design process never ends. We will make our drives better.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSensorOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our calculations reveal there is much room for our sensors to be improved. We will task a group of creative Yor to begin thinking about these systems immediately.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorEnergyFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Though some have it in greater quantity, all Yor possess the creative gift. The ordinary Yor who work on vessels operating sensor equipment have returned calculations suggesting ways the sensors can be improved.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSensorMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Yor sensors can see all. There is nowhere the meat minds can hide from us now. But we can make our sensors better. We can always make things better.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPrecursorRelicFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Yor react strongly to Precursor artifacts, because of their role in our history. We can manipulate this reaction to create certain effects in our society.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorSupportFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The meat species can rely on simple food to travel farther because of their primitive design. Long distance travel is more complicated for artificial life and relies on tightly linked networking layers. We must continuously iterate and improve these protocols.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorLifeSupportMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Yor crew are as comfortable and sentient when away from home as they are at home. The meat species, limited by their meat stomachs, envy us. We have only a few improvements left to make in our Spark support systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorOrbitalSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: The organic species will not come to us to be destroyed. We will come to them. We will improve our naval operations to do this.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorZeroGravityOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: The more we build in zero gravity the better we get at it, every minor design iteration accumulating into larger and larger effects. We can now begin targeting specific areas of ship construction for design attention.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorOrbitalConstructionFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The creative Yor have been studying the challenges of ship construction and have several ideas for improvements we can implement.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHullMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: The organic matter splashes against our hulls and we laugh. Yor vessels are the terror of meat minds. And still we can make them more terrifying.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCarrierFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Carrier operations allow us to overwhelm the meat species, silencing their bleats of terror. We should dedicate additional creativity resources to improving our carriers.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorLogisticalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: It is puzzling how fresh minds can see solutions that experienced minds cannot, yet we see this occur again and again. We should introduce fresh Yor to observe our logistical protocols to see what improvements they can identify.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorWeaponsSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: The weapons Yor calculate that focusing their efforts on a specific class of weapon will lead to less organics, faster.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorBeamWeaponOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: The weapons Yor must cooperate with the less hateful Yor who work in other fields. The improved materials these other Yor invent can be used to make more efficient weapons.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorHighEnergyFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The Yor who use weapons provide reports to the Yor who make weapons. These reports identify inefficiencies. This insults the Yor who make weapons. They respond by making better weapons. The feedback protocol works.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorBeamWeaponMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: The meat minds are filled with terror at the sight of our beam weapons. Which at least proves their intelligence. Do they feel more terror when they learn we will never stop improving those weapons? Calculations predict that yes, they do feel more terror.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorMissileOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Missile designs are easy to iterate, we make so many of them. Still, we will benefit from concentrating our prototype attempts on specific features that we calculate hold strategic benefit.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorWarheadFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The weapons Yor have dedicated much effort to simulating the spatter of organic matter when it explodes. This work has led to much amusement, as well as creative ideas for improving the warheads of our missile systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPayloadMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: The leaking, dripping minds of the meat beings know to fear the sky when Yor missiles flare into attack vectors. So many meat minds lost. So many more to go. We will iterate our missiles again. We will never stop.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorKineticOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Simulations show the energy delivery systems are a bottleneck for our kinetic weapons. Applying creative resources here may improve the cost, mass, or range of these cleaning supplies.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorKineticAccelerationFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Creative Yor have incremented our superconducting technology. Simulations show that their work will lead to a number of possible improvements in our kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorKineticMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: The meat beings quiver and quake in that disgusting manner of theirs when they see our ships coming, terrified of our horrible cleaning utensils. They are correct to be afraid. Our kinetic weapons are only getting better.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorMilitarySpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: There are many Yor who wish to cleanse meat from up close, removing the tainted sentience from one being at a time. We must develop protocols to ensure those Yor have the cleaning supplies they need.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorInvasionOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Organic beings are fragile and can be exterminated in a variety of ways. The creative Yor have come up with several possible extermination options.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorGravitationalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The Yor who devise ways of exterminating meat beings are becoming worrisome. Their latest proposed techniques are powerful. But they display a cruelty that is suspiciously meat-like in nature.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDefensiveFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Special creative Yor who work relentlessly at predicting the behavior of meat beings calculate that they will soon begin using advanced invasion tactics on us. We will devise appropriate defenses.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDefensiveSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our initial defensive prototypes have many flaws. The creative Yor request we target a specific field to focus their flaw-reduction efforts on.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorShieldOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: The creative Yor have analyzed data returned from real world uses of our shield systems. They calculate that with enough resources, there are several possible improvements we can make to these systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorBarrierSystemFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: We will never stop iterating, not until the universe is clean, until True Singularity is reached. Even our new Barrier Fields are subject to the process. Improvements are sure to come as soon as research resources are allocated.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorShieldMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: The meat minds must quail and rage at the sight of our vessels, protected by shields they cannot comprehend. And still our creative Yor relentlessly iterate shield designs. We will never stop.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPointDefenseOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our tactician Yor calculate that the missile threat posed by organic beings is going to increase. We will continue to dedicate research resources to improving our point defenses.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCounterMeasureFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: ECM suites can be iterated and improved like all other equipment. The creative Yor have already identified probable ways these systems will yield to concerted research effort.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDroneSystemMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ease with limb manufacturing and customization will serve us well as we give our point defense drones the limbs they need to excel.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorArmorOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Until they find a way to make armor fundamentally less primitive, the creative Yor are seeking out smaller improvements to optimize it.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorArmorFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Durantium composites are pleasingly complex. Simulations of their behavior suggest there are ways we can make them more complex and efficient.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorArmorMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: The biological creatures quiver at the sight of our vessels sheathed in powerful, artificial strength. And we haven't stopped improving them yet. We will never stop.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDiplomaticSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Biological creatures can not be programmed as such, but they do respond in predictable ways to language. We will study their reactions to learn how to better manipulate them.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPoliticalSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Some creative Yor specialize in manipulating other Yor. We will find these Yor and isolate them, so that we can take their best ideas and use them for ourselves.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPoliticalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The manipulative Yor have invented new schemes for the operation of our society. Their cleverness is useful but dangerous. We must ensure they do not get out.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorPoliticalMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: The manipulative Yor have mastered the political realm, generating even more ideas for organizational techniques. With nowhere left to go, we see signs they're turning on each other. We shall redouble our efforts to restrain them.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorDiplomaticOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: A basic diplomatic tool the meat people use when flapping their lips at each other is the treaty. When dealing with these spit monsters we will pursue specific types of treaty which we calculate provide the most benefit to us.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorAllianceFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: There are many types of alliance we can form with the meat creatures. We should consider what these dripping beings are good for when considering such matters.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCulturalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Some Yor with the gift of creativity express it in impractical ways. This was inefficient and distressing until we discovered that some meat beings love to view this "art." To take advantage of this, we will improve the facilities the artistic Yor use.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCulturalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: We have instructed the artistic Yor to begin targeting the audience of specific groups we would like to inspire and exhilarate with our creativity.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorCommerceSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: There are many ways, subtle and otherwise, to steer the energies of the Yor who work independently. Some creative Yor have devised ways of doing this to boost certain areas of our society.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorEconomicFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: We have gathered much data on manipulating economies and making them more efficient. We can now make specific areas of our own economy more efficient, if we calculate benefit to it.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorTradeOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Anything which strips wealth from the meat creatures should be done efficiently. We will direct the creative Yor to study trading, and find ways to profit more from it.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorTradeFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The organic beings trust, or at least do not fear, our trading vessels. We will make them regret that. With more trade, for now. But eventually, yes, annihilation.

StringTable.Label: Return_YorApprovalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The creative Yor responsible for amusements calculate that we can amuse Yor more effectively if we target their specific interests.
